page.title: 05Housing. Bradgate.
page.content:
An Interview
My name is Mrs Johnson. My job is a shopkeeper. I have worked in the shop for nine years. There are two people employed in the shop. We both would like more facilities. The shop is a General Store. The shop owner lives in the house overlooking the shop. It is terraced house. There are about five hundred houses round the shop. We have had some improvements in the area; some houses have been knocked down and replaced with modern town houses. I think there is not much future here. Maybe it will even be flattened.
